本件保存7年
THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION ENGINEERS AND CONSTRUCTORS 8 O BROAD STREET NEW YORK 4, N. Y.
FIELD OFFICE TAIPEI, TAIWAN. P. O. BOX NO. 23 TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, TAIPEI.
TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, NEW YORK
April 26, 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Subject: Excess Equipment Project No. 84-99-471
Dear Mr. Chang:
Attached hereto are two lists of "Misc. Automotive Parts" which have been given to PWB under various purchase orders (items of equipment obtained from Tainan Air Base).
As you will recall from previous correspondence these items are to be allocated, as best suited to current and/or foreseeable needs of four recipients.
140.112.213.82
To date, this final allocation has not been determined. PWB desire that their record be approved, to relieve them from any later question of accuracy.
White Engineering, after a study of various papers, including 1149 forms, agree that this attached list is as reasonably accurate as can be compiled and recommend that the list be accepted without further question.

paragraphs.content: THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION ENGINEERS AND CONSTRUCTORS 8 O BROAD STREET NEW YORK 4, N. Y.
FIELD OFFICE TAIPEI, TAIWAN. P. O. BOX NO. 23 TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, TAIPEI.
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Attached hereto are two lists of "Misc. Automotive Parts" which have been given to PWB under various purchase orders (items of equipment obtained from Tainan Air Base).
As you will recall from previous correspondence these items are to be allocated, as best suited to current and/or foreseeable needs of four recipients.
To date, this final allocation has not been determined. PWB desire that their record be approved, to relieve them from any later question of accuracy.

White Engineering, after a study of various papers, including 1149 forms, agree that this attached list is as reasonably accurate as can be compiled and recommend that the list be accepted without further question.
Very truly yours, THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION
4.0 00 G. E. Otto Spec. Writer & Bid Analyst
